ValidationRule.description: When lead status is closed by FSE and owner role is FSE, Actual revenue realized field should become mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed By FSE'), ( ISBLANK( Actual_Revenue_Realized__c ) ), CONTAINS( Owner__r.UserRole.Name , 'FSE') ) && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ'
